This weekend, thousands of the website's users will be going offline to gather in the real world for reddit's second global day of
title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, October 2, 2013
description: The website Reddit has grown exponentially in recent years. It now accepts 19 million up or down votes every day on links to everything from celebrity advice to pornography. This weekend, thousands of the website's users will be going offline to gather in the real world for reddit's second global day of service.
teaser: The website Reddit has grown exponentially in recent years. It now accepts 19 million up or down votes every day on links to everything from celebrity advice to pornography. This weekend, thousands of the website's users will be going offline to gather in the real world for reddit's second global day of service.
byline: Bruce Johnson, Noel King and David Gura
